content: अवसो {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To finish, accomplish. {@--2@} To destroy. {@--3@} To determine, understand; किमप्यनवसीयमानं <ls>K. 278</ls>; अवासासीच्च वैयासिकीं (वाणीं) <ls>Malli.</ls> {@--4@} (Intrans.) To fail; be at an end; शक्तिर्ममावस्यति हीनयुद्धे <ls>Ki. 16. 17.</ls> {@--5@} To put up (as at an inn). {@--6@} To let loose, liberate. {@--7@} To draw near, approach. {@--8@} To dwell, stay. {@--9@} To settle, fix. {@--10@} To stand firm, to persist in. {@--11@} To know; <ls>Bk. 19. 28.</ls> {@--12@} To get, attain to, reach. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to be completed, finish, complete; अथ विधिमवसाय्य शास्त्रदृष्टं <ls>R. 5. 76.</ls> {@--2@} To understand, comprehend; अवसाययितुं क्षमाः सुखं <ls>Ki. 2. 29.</ls>
